title: Dynamic text content type has no effect
description: When using a dynamic text element to display content from a database field with three types of content, the Content Type property setting has no effect on the displayed results.
OB: The dynamic text element does not change its display based on the Content Type property setting. Whether I set it to Auto, Plain, or HTML, the displayed results remain the same.
EB:
I expect the dynamic text element to display the content according to the Content Type property setting as follows:

- For Plain, I expect the literal content (including tags) to be displayed.
- For Auto, I expect content 1, 2, and 3 to appear properly without any HTML or RTF tags.
- For HTML, I expect content 1 and 2 to appear properly without HTML tags, and content 3 to appear literally with RTF tags.

Please refer to the attached report for a visual representation of the expected results.
SR:
To reproduce this issue, follow these steps:

1. Have a database field with three types of content:
   - HTML text within <html>...</html> tags.
   - HTML fragments not within <html> tags.
   - Text with RTF tags.
2. Use a dynamic text element to display the contents of this field.
